seg-source.mrk: decryptDatabase

target.mrk: decryptDatabase

seg-source.mrk: Function

target.mrk: Function

trans-unit.source: Returns an encrypted database to an unencrypted state. For information about data encryption, see "Encrypting databases on disk" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

seg-source.mrk: Returns an encrypted database to an unencrypted state.
For information about data encryption, see "Encrypting databases on disk" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

target.mrk: Returns an encrypted database to an unencrypted state.
For information about data encryption, see "Encrypting databases on disk" in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph></cite>.

trans-unit.source: You must shut down the database before you decrypt it. An attempt to decrypt a booted database has no effect.

seg-source.mrk: You must shut down the database before you decrypt it.
An attempt to decrypt a booted database has no effect.

target.mrk: You must shut down the database before you decrypt it.
An attempt to decrypt a booted database has no effect.

trans-unit.source: Specifying this attribute for an unencrypted database has no effect.

seg-source.mrk: Specifying this attribute for an unencrypted database has no effect.

target.mrk: Specifying this attribute for an unencrypted database has no effect.

seg-source.mrk: Combining with other attributes

target.mrk: Combining with other attributes

trans-unit.source: The decryptDatabase=true attribute must be combined with either the bootPassword=key attribute or the encryptionKey=key attribute.

seg-source.mrk: The decryptDatabase=true attribute must be combined with either the bootPassword=key attribute or the encryptionKey=key attribute.

target.mrk: The decryptDatabase=true attribute must be combined with either the bootPassword=key attribute or the encryptionKey=key attribute.

trans-unit.source: For an existing, encrypted database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can perform decryption. See also "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.

seg-source.mrk: For an existing, encrypted database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can perform decryption.
See also "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.

target.mrk: For an existing, encrypted database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can perform decryption.
See also "Enabling user authentication" and "Setting the SQL standard authorization mode" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citdevelop"></ph> for more information.

trans-unit.source: After you decrypt the database, be sure to check for SQLWarnings. The decryption succeeded only if there were no SQLWarnings or SQLExceptions.

seg-source.mrk: After you decrypt the database, be sure to check for SQLWarnings.
The decryption succeeded only if there were no SQLWarnings or SQLExceptions.

target.mrk: After you decrypt the database, be sure to check for SQLWarnings.
The decryption succeeded only if there were no SQLWarnings or SQLExceptions.

seg-source.mrk: Examples

target.mrk: Examples

trans-unit.source: -- decrypt a database jdbc:derby:encryptedDB;decryptDatabase=true;bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe -- decrypt a database with authentication and SQL authorization enabled jdbc:derby:salesdb;decryptDatabase=true;user=user1;password=mypass; bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe

seg-source.mrk: -- decrypt a database jdbc:derby:encryptedDB;decryptDatabase=true;bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe -- decrypt a database with authentication and SQL authorization enabled jdbc:derby:salesdb;decryptDatabase=true;user=user1;password=mypass; bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe

target.mrk: -- decrypt a database jdbc:derby:encryptedDB;decryptDatabase=true;bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe -- decrypt a database with authentication and SQL authorization enabled jdbc:derby:salesdb;decryptDatabase=true;user=user1;password=mypass; bootPassword=cLo4u922sc23aPe
